summary: This document contains the Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions for Plan D, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts for the company. It details the powers granted to authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein, and outlines the responsibilities and liabilities associated with these accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for Plan D, LLC, with the authority to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is also mentioned as an authorized signer for Plan D, LLC, with similar powers regarding account management.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for Plan D, LLC, indicating a professional relationship in managing the company's financial affairs.

keyFacts: The document certifies the LLC Resolutions for Plan D, LLC, allowing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers for the company.
The document outlines the powers and responsibilities of the authorized signers regarding account management.
The bank is authorized to rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
The resolutions have not been modified or amended since the date shown in the document.
